homepage.heroHeading: Protecting Academic Integrity in the AI Era
homepage.heroSubheading: We help universities maintain trust in student work and research. Build AI policies that work without starting an arms race.
homepage.missionText: We partner with universities to build academic integrity frameworks. Faculty learn to assess student work in AI environments. Institutions maintain standards while adopting AI responsibly.
